thread.title: Trump pushes death penalty for drug dealers

title: Trump pushes death penalty for drug dealers
text:
Trump pushes death penalty for drug dealers 4:38pm EDT - 01:55 
At an event in New Hampshire, which has been hit hard by the opioid epidemic, President Trump on Monday unveiled his plan to battle the growing crisis in America. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
